page.title: 17Religion in Gumley/Laughton.
page.content: { Gumley}has a small & pretty church with red & green tiles on the ceiling.Part of the roof was recently repaired.Only one entrance door is now used.There are three bells,screened by a curtain.The altar has been moved forward. {Laughton}Church is in good condition, and has changed little in 100 years. Some gravestones have been moved to the side of the church yard.In 1980 an electronic organ replaced the pipe organ.The altar has been moved forward A new electric heating system was recently installed. { Services}at both churches are ASB only,3 services a month.Average attendances at Laughton 16.Following rumours of closure at Gumley,attendance increased,but fell back to 9 in 1984.
